text: The 2018–19 Real Sociedad season is the club's 72nd season in La Liga. This article shows player statistics and all matches (official and friendly) played by the club during the 2018–19 season. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Reserve team=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Date !Player !From !Type !Fee !Ref |- | 27 June 2018 || Markel Bergara || Getafe ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 30 June 2018 || Héctor Hernández || Alavés ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 30 June 2018 || Joseba Zaldúa || Leganés ||colspan=2|Loan return|| |- | 12 July 2018 || Mikel Merino || Newcastle United || Transfer || €12,000,000 || |- | 10 August 2018 || Theo Hernandez || Real Madrid ||colspan=2|Loan|| |- | 30 August 2018 || Sandro || Everton ||colspan=2|Loan|| |- | 30 January 2019 || Modibo Sagnan || Racing Club de Lens || Transfer || €5,000,000 || |- |} ===Out=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Date !Player !To !Type !Fee !Ref |- | 27 June 2018 || Markel Bergara || Getafe || Transfer || Free || |- | 28 June 2018 || Toño || AEK Larnaca || Transfer || Free || |- | 30 June 2018 || Xabi Prieto ||colspan=3 align=center|Retired|| |- | 3 July 2018 || Sergio Canales || Real Betis || Transfer || Free || |- | 5 July 2018 || Álvaro Odriozola || Real Madrid || Transfer || €40,000,000 || |- | 6 July 2018 || Carlos Martínez || Oviedo || Transfer || Free || |- | 27 August 2018 || Alberto de la Bella || Las Palmas || Transfer || Free || |- | 29 August 2018 || Imanol Agirretxe ||colspan=3 align=center|Retired|| |- | 30 August 2018 || Héctor Hernández || Tenerife || Transfer || Free || |- | 30 January 2019 || Modibo Sagnan || Racing Club de Lens ||colspan=2|Loan || |} ==Competitions== ===Overall=== ===La Liga=== ====League table==== ====Results summary==== ====Results by round==== ====Matches==== ===Copa del Rey=== ====Round of 32==== ====Round of 16==== ==Statistics== ===Appearances and goals=== :Last updated on 18 May 2019 |- !
